mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_INFO WHERE M_NO=#{m_no}
SELECT A.*, B.S_LOGIMG, B.S_NAME FROM ORDER_INFO A JOIN STORE B ON A.S_NO = B.S_NO WHERE A.M_NO=#{m_no} ORDER BY O_DATE DESC
SELECT M.ME_NAME, M.ME_LOGIMG, OM.SD_ARRAY FROM ORDER_MENU OM JOIN MENU M ON OM.ME_NO = M.ME_NO WHERE OM.O_NO=#{o_no}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO REVIEW VALUES(REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{reviewCon} , #{taste}, #{amount}, #{delivery}, DEFAULT, #{m_no}, #{s_no}, #{o_no})
SELECT REVIEW_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE M_NO=#{m_no}
SELECT RE.*, STO.S_NAME AS S_NAME FROM REVIEW RE JOIN STORE STO ON RE.S_NO=STO.S_NO WHERE M_NO=#{m_no}
SELECT R_IMG FROM REVIEW_IMG WHERE R_NO = #{r_no}

SELECT STO.S_NO, STO.S_NAME, STO.S_LOGIMG,(SELECT TRUNC(AVG((R_SCORE_TASTE+R_SCORE_AMOUNT+R_SCORE_DELIVERY)/3),2) FROM REVIEW WHERE S_NO=1) AS S_SCORE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE S_NO=#{m_no}) AS S_REVIEWCOUNT, STO.S_TEXT FROM PREFER PRE JOIN STORE STO ON PRE.S_NO=STO.S_NO WHERE PRE.M_NO=#{m_no}

mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET M_PW = #{m_pw}, M_EMAIL = #{m_email}, M_PHONE = #{m_phone}, M_NICKNAME = #{m_nickname} WHERE M_NO=#{m_no}
